description:
Highly nutritious dog food manufactured using processed monster parts fresh from the wastelands! The perfect treat for rapidly improving the abilities of fighting dogs. This DLC will grant Pochi additional skill points to unlock more powerful abilities faster.      

*After downloading, this DLC item can be obtained by travelling to the map location 'Undersea Tunnel'.

To use this content, you will need to have purchased the full version of the game. Please update your software before use.
name: Super Chow
